Sorry, didn't know that Skulletron was supposed to be in the brig as 
well.  Scratch Feline's post to him then.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Actually, Skulletron was in the brig, with Smokescreen watching. I 
have no 
> idea how he could have appeared at a CR.'
> 
> ::Zardus/Oblitertron::
> 
> Zardus looks over at Soundave, dodging an optic shot. "Fire at 
those fools," 
> he says, pointing to the crazy-looking Lavacons running through the 
forest.
> 
> Aiming his plasma launcher, he fires a hit at Fenox.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Oblitertron roars, firing his optics at Astral and his rifle at 
Fenox as they 
> start their rampage.
